relevant_findings.Neck: Supple, not able to appreciate JVP
relevant_findings.Lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, with some rales at the bases bilaterally, no wheezes/ronchi
relevant_findings.CV: Irregularly irregular rhythm, distant normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.Abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, bowel sounds present, no rebound tenderness or guarding, no organomegaly
relevant_findings.GU: Foley in place draining clear urine
relevant_findings.Extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema
